successes.title: Charlie Kaufman's Anomalisa
successes.description: From Charlie Kaufman, writer of Being John Malkovich and Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, comes Anomalisa his first animated film

Pledges.description: LAST MINUTE HELP!!  For helping us cross the threshold in the final hours you get your name posted on the official Anomalisa Facebook page along with a Downloadable 1 minute clip from the official animatic!  (An animatic is an animated version of the storyboards with the actorsâ€™ voices and temp music/ sound FX that is used as a blueprint for the finished animation)  Don't worry, everyone who has already pledged higher than $5 will get this automatically!!  Thank you!
Thank You!  A downloadable Anomalisa movie poster and a Personalized Thank You message via Twitter @AnomalisaMovie
BY POPULAR DEMAND!  A digital download of Anomalisa once the film has been distributed!
Behind the Scenes Exclusives!  A downloadable set of Anomalisa Character Designs and Artwork from the film, plus all of the above.
See The Film!  A DVD copy of the film once it has been distributed and all of the above.
BLU RAY!!!  By popular demand, you will receive one Blu Ray copy of Anomalisa once it has been distributed.  Includes everything above, except for the DVD.  Higher tiers must specify DVD or Blu Ray.
From Script to Screen!  A set of Anomalisa storyboards from a scene in the film signed by the director and all of the above.
See your name in lights!!  For your generous contribution you will receive -- On Screen Special Thanks credit and all of the above
It All Starts Here!  A signed Anomalisa Script and all of the above.

EXCLUSIVE!! ORIGINAL ARTWORK from PENDELTON WARD the creator of ADVENTURE TIME!!  A Special Edition Limited Run 24x38 Silkscreened Poster, exclusive to this Kickstarter campaign.  Each poster will be individually numbered and signed by the artist!
(Exclusive to this tier only)
Includes your choice of a Blu-Ray or DVD, the digital download, signed storyboards, downloadable artwork and twitter thank you.
International Backers please add $20 for s&h

See It In Action!  An Exclusive Studio Tour of Starburns Industries during filming and ONE "Weeklies" Screening of Anomalisa work-in-progress with Cast and Crew.  (Travel and accommodations not included) and all of the above.

EXCLUSIVE!!  HOODED SWEATSHIRT featuring ORIGINAL ARTWORK from PENDELTON WARD the creator of ADVENTURE TIME!!  A Special Edition Limited Run American Apparel Black Zip Front Hooded Sweatshirt with original artwork exclusive to this Kickstarter campaign.
(Exclusive to this tier only)
Includes your choice of a Blu-Ray or DVD, the digital download, signed storyboards, downloadable artwork and twitter thank you.
International Backers please add $30 for s&h

SUPER STAR TIER!  
The POSTER, the HOODIE and the SIGNED SCRIPT!!
(Exclusive to this tier only)
Includes your choice of a Blu-Ray or DVD, the digital download, signed storyboards, downloadable artwork and twitter thank you.
International Backers please add $30 for s&h
2 Tickets to attend the Anomalisa Premiere Screening and Party with Cast and Crew. (Travel and accommodations not included) and all of the above.
